episodes.title: Killer Yoga - The Doomsday Cult of Aum Shinrikyo
episodes.description: You normally associate yoga with love and light, but what started out as a peaceful path to spiritual enlightenment turned into a horrific doomsday cult when Shoko Asahara founded the religious group "Aum Shinrikyo" in Japan in the 1980's. Today, we explore how a charismatic and manipulative man was able to convince his followers to perform the 1995 Tokyo subway sarin gas attack, leaving Japan, and the rest of the world, both shocked and horrified. Today's sources include: https://www.ebsco.com/research-starters/biography/shoko-asahara https://irp.fas.org/congress/1995_rpt/aum/part03.htm https://www.shambhala.com/snowlion_articles/phowa-teachings/#:~:text=The%20Phowa%20practice%2C%20or%20Transference%20of%20Consciousness,in%20the%20six%20realms%20of%20cyclic%20existence.&text=In%20the%20Vajrayana%2C%20Phowa%20is%20known%20as%20a%20quick%2C%20direct%20path%20to%20enlightenment https://www.nytimes.com/1995/03/26/world/guru-s-journey-special-report-seer-among-blind-japanese-sect-leader-s-rise.html Support the show Like our podcast? episodes.title: Love Has Won - The Cult of Mother God, Colloidal Silver, and the Spirit of Robin Williams
episodes.description: On April 29, 2021, police entered 4 Alcedo Court in Crestone, Colorado in response to a complaint that members of a group called “Love Has Won” were residing at the home of Michael Lamboy without permission. In a back bedroom, they discover the mummified, blue corpse of a VERY emaciated female. The corpse was found wearing heavy glitter eyeshadow, and was wrapped in a sleeping bag covered with twinkling Christmas lights. The corpse was later identified as 45 year old cult leader, Amy Carlson aka “Mother God”. What turned a seemingly normal, successful mother into one of the most infamous cult leaders in modern day times? Let's find out in today's episode! Today's Sources Include: https://www.max.com/shows/love-has-won-the-cult-of-mother-god/892bef6f-2c42-4b41-856a-c41381f5103d https://www.womanandhome.com/life/news-entertainment/love-has-won-where-are-amy-carlsons-children-now/ https://www.hindustantimes.com/world-news/us-news/who-was-amy-carlson-exploring-the-bizarre-life-of-love-has-won-cult-leader-mother-god-101701188086710-amp.html https://www.nccih.nih.gov/health/colloidal-silver-what-you-need-to-know https://youtu.be/l6WxeIvC7Is?si=37JWwb6PckpsV229 https://youtu.be/9kCYgsOBSY0?si=oSoHbolc1L20L7v2 https://www.cbsnews.com/colorado/news/amy-carlson-hbo-love-has-won-cult-colorado-documentary/ https://youtu.be/9kCYgsOBSY0?si=oSoHbolc1L20L7v2 Support the show Like our podcast? episodes.title: The Tale of Jodi Hildebrandt - The Demon Possessed, Child Abusing Cult Leader
episodes.description:
You've all heard the story of Little Miss Ruby Franke and her 8 Passengers train wreck of a YouTube channel, but do you know the story of her counterpart, Jodi Hildebrandt? Join us today as we find out who this monster really is and what led her to take part in the heinous crimes that she is now in prison for.

episodes.title: Heaven's Gate
episodes.description: On March 26, 1997, 39 people, all wearing matching dark clothing and Nike sneakers, were found dead in a large mansion in San Diego, California. What caused these people to take their own lives, and what do aliens and the Hale-Bopp comet have to do with it? Find out today as we deep dive into the cult created by Marshall Applewhite and Bonnie Nettles. Todays Sources Include: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heaven%27s_Gate_(religious_group) The Dark Story Behind A UFO "Religious" Group - Heavens Gate Bailey Sarian - Mystery & Makeup https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=ISqjBMXuBe4&t=525s Absolutely Unhinged: Mass Murder of 39 People?! episodes.title: Life With Grandpa and The Family International
episodes.description: Well, we have finally made it to our very first cult episode! Join us today as we dive into the crazy and disgusting mind of David "Grandpa" Berg, and his infamous sex cult: The Family International. We will also break down his sick and twisted television production, "Life With Grandpa", a demented puppet show created specifically for the grooming of children into his cult. Sources: Smartschoolboy9 doc creator exposed “perverted” kids TV show created by a cult - Daisy Phillipson https://www.dexerto.com/tv-movies/smartschoolboy9-documentary-creator-exposes-cult-life-with-grandpa-2982646/ The Life and Death of The “Children of God” Messiah - Peter Wilkinson https://www.rollingstone.com/culture/culture-features/children-of-god-cult-messiah-chosen-one-182272/ Life With Grandpa episode - UFO Cult VHS https://youtu.be/qz_1rsZ04Ew?si=yvLA2oW2eqze7xEc The Darkest Kids TV Show Ever Made - Nick Crowley https://youtu.be/RxdHAx_lZqo?si=-tqMEhwtmq22x-xt Life With Grandpa: Robot Song - Faded Endeavor https://youtu.be/fyTbIsDwofQ?si=TauE1EKRP7N0mThs The Family International (The Children of God) http://www.people.vcu.edu/~dbromley/undergraduate/spiritualCommunity/TheFamilyInternational.html https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ricky_Rodriguez https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Karen_Zerby https://www.karenzerby.org Like our podcast?
